long_description: The REI Rashguard Suit comfortably protects the skin of infant and toddler boys when they're having fun in and around the water. Nylon/spandex fabric offers excellent UPF 50+ sun protection. Durable fabric guards skin against abrasion; it also offers 4-way stretch comfort for active kids. Fabric wicks moisture and dries fast to prevent chills if the breeze picks up. Full-zip back and snap crotch provide easy access for diaper changing. The REI Rashguard Suit for infants and toddlers can be machine washed and dried with low heat.
short_description: The REI Rashguard Suit comfortably protects the skin of infant and toddler boys when they're having fun in and around the water.
